casebody.data:
D'AQUISTO
v.
HEALTH SYSTEM. No. 415PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 9, 2005. Allan R. Tarleton, Asheville, for Health System. Thomas F. Ramer, for Caroline D'Aquisto.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of December 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Caroline D'Aquisto) shall have up to and including the 9th day of January 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of December 2005."
